attributes.action: Impose a windfall tax on Energy companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is totally unacceptable that the energy companies are doing little or nothing to keep people out of fuel poverty.
The obscene profits they have made and the millions they pay out to share holders while the general public has to suffer is not only highly immoral, but also unjust.
A windfall tax needs to be imposed and then redistributed to the public in order to help them pay bills and bring them out of fuel poverty.
